SVGAttributeBegin.summary: The begin attribute defines when an animation should begin.

remarks.para: The attribute value is a semicolon separated list of values. The interpretation of a list of start times is detailed in the SMIL specification in "Evaluation of begin and end time lists". Each individual value can be one of the following: <offset-value>, <syncbase-value>, <event-value>, <repeat-value>, <accessKey-value>, <wallclock-sync-value> or the keyword indefinite.
